nodes.text: Xylan Graf's tower was a tower located within Coruscant's Galactic City, owned by Graf family scion Xylan Graf. The building had 2125 floors, several hundred of which were below level, with Graf himself residing in the top ten. Having been gifted the tower by the family matriarch, Catriona Graf, on his eighteenth birthday, Graf was tasked with making the building profitable, which he did by renting out the floors that he did not occupy.
